reviewText: If you have the chance to buy or rent this B movie, do so in confidence, that it will bring 90 minutes of pleasantry to your life, and leave you feeling good!

easy, sweet love story.  It says 2015 but this show was actually made in 2010. Dean Cain looked to young to be 49, but he was still around 42 or so when this movie was actally made.  He still looked young for that age.  Acting was not to bad.  Cute dog.
boring

I've watched this movie seveal times.  This. to me, is an amusing, enjoyable and entertaining movie - it keeps my interest even after several viewings. Good staring actors and a good supporting cast. It is what I'd call a romantic comedy. HEY, AMAZON, MORE LIKE THIS MOVIE FORMAT, PLEASE. If asked, this is a move I can recommend others to watch. Give it a try - I think you'll like it.

well - hum - what to say - dumbfounded - could have been better - most certainly could have been worse - but how does she keep house and pay off 500k - (the end window epilogue eludes to completion) anywho - time better spent looking elsewhere
Not a Halmark movie
Saw the trailer's for this movie and it looks really idiotic and NOT worth the price of $19.99 which way too much money.. Don't waste your money!!!

Great movie.  A little bit cheesy and predictable, but with subtle side stories that made it fun to watch.  A great flick for a night on the couch with someone you love.  Easy to enjoy when you are in a lighthearted mood.
Painful.  Simply too hard to watch; sound and quality like a 1972 flick.  ouch.
Loved it!

Ok so taking away the fact that this is a "C", trying to be a "B", movie this is just not in good taste. I would assume that this is supposed to be a family movie? It feels like who ever wrote it never made it out of their parents basement. I can't believe that somebody actually though that this was good enough to direct and produce. I love Dean Cane but this is pure garbage.. Do no not waste your time!!

I kept watching, I guess hoping it would get better. Main actor either doesn't know how to act, or the director was horrible. Over played and fake looking. Other than that it was a movie I might have enjoyed.
Mother loves it

I thought it would be a nice background movie but it was a bit slow and each 'next happening' was very obvious.  The plot is not very much.  The mix of portoguese spoken too fast was hard to follow even to read the subtitles.  Situations were simplistic and expected that was no fun to watch.  Acting was light.
I loved it!!  defnitely a chick flick!!!
A very pleasant movie.  I enjoyed it.  Good story and acting.  Made me smile.  :)
I really did enjoy it! It was fun and quirky.

This is a pleasant enough romantic comedy. Contrary to the Amazon credits as I write this, it stars Juliana Paes who is a steamy Brazilian actress. Jamie Anderson appears ever so briefly and definitely is not a lead in the film.

I can't say that either Dean Cain or Juliana Paes shine in their acting. The film plays mostly off of the steam of Paes although there is a fair amount of romance between her and Dean Cain's character. Add a bit of comedy and there you have it.

There isn't anything in this that would require editing for mainstream American TV censorship.
Good Lord, that was awful.  That's all I can say.  I don't want to waste anymore time on this issue.
Yes, I like romance movies and I have to say that it's quite a coincidence that this movie as well as the movie Serendipity are two of my favorites.
This is a predictable Hallmark Channel style movie.  The only credible actor was the dog.
I Loved it..
Great romantic drama!

This was a cute, if not slightly predictable, romance. Very cozy and easy watching, although I was (pleasantly) surprised by various sexual references throughout the movie, whether it be about someone's sexuality or the couple in the bed and breakfast actually having sex pretty much the entire time. The chemistry between the 2 main leads was believable. Bill Engvall and the actress playing Maria stole the movie.
It was just ok.
Cheesy and predictable.  I knew the resolution the moment the two main characters met. There was  no real conflict or problem to solve. The acting was poor and even the background music was silly.

Simple rom-com and simply charming for putting a happy-ending-smile on your face after the end of a long day. I like the chemistry between the main characters and the cute quirks of the rest of the cast.

Cute movie. A nice movie to just unwind with. Decent, somewhat charming, story line. I liked the house, the fixing it up. Gave a Under the Tuscan Sun feel. Could had even relied more on that, even had the vineyards in the movie and such. I liked the two main characters and felt the parts were well acted. I've always had a crush on Dean Cain. The secondary characters, though done in humor, were a bit over the top. I also felt it could had ended a little better. Though it does give you the blessedly wonderful, even if typical, happy ending, I still felt there was a few lose ends. Overall, worth the watch.
Love it!!!
Cute movie. Actors were engaging, and a typical RomCom. Easy to watch.
Cute movie, well done.
Relaxing and lighthearted, funny at times.
Very good.  I love light romances.

Cute but predictable.
A nice diversion
Pretty good movie.  It's not one I would watch twice, but good...simple and uplifting...a Harlequin romance type of movie.
Really sweet little film! My husband and I both enjoyed it a lot.
Story line just ok. Minor actors are not as good.
nice story line. Not for general public as we think.
Meh. Really slow moving. Got good at the very end.

Enjoyable movie....no crime, no blood, no gore, no aliens....predictable....happy... just what you need after a long day at work.  Smiles!  Love Dean Cain...still handsome and adorable.
Super cute, feel good movie.

I feel the characters and the story was actually really cute and nice and could have stood on their own. I would have given this movie maybe 3 or 4 stars. However, with the all the emphasis on sex in this movie, it makes me wonder about their lack of confidence and/ or creative abilities for this movie without it. What producers may try and resonate as entertainment, I just get a sense of a lack of creativity and confidence, whether in the characters, the story or worse in their actors abilities to make an entertaining movie with out it. This is why I gave this movie only one star.
Very nice love story.
Excellent movie. It has a happy ending.
A fun movie....well acted.  A real "feel good" movie!
Very cute indeed!!!  Love Dean Cain!!!
Too predictable.
If I could give it ZERO stars I would.  What a sorry excuse for a movie.
Horrible acting and extremely predictable. Don't waste your time.

Two wills clash at a pretty place in northern California. A light hearted movie that's attractive especially with the presence of Julianna Paes... she is very beautiful and her manner is delightful. I loved the dinner preparation scene.
